title: Login to your account
description: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
name: Name
name_desc: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
password_desc: When signing in to your account you need to use your email and password
email_verification_pending: Your email address has not been verified yet. You need to first verify your email to activate your Agnost account.
email_verification_pending_desc: Click button below to send the email verification code to
verification_page_info: Keep this window open while checking for your code. If you haven't received our email, please check your spam folder.
sent_verification_code: We've sent a six-digit confirmation code to <email>{{email}}</email>. Please enter your code below to activate your account.
forgot_password_desc: Don’t worry! Fill in your email address you use to sign in to Agnost and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
sent_reset_password_email: Link and instructions for resetting your password have been sent to <email>{{email}}</email>
if_you_dont_receive_email: If you don’t receive it right away, please check your spam folder
you_have_been_added: You have been successfully added to {{name}} with {{role}} privileges.
complete_account_setup_desc: Complete your personal account setup to access the Agnost platform. Logging in requires a completed account setup.
complete_account_setup_info: If you have been invited to an organization or an app and accepted the invitation, then you might have an account with an incomplete setup (e.g., missing password, name). Please enter your email to start completing your account set up.
enter_new_password_desc: Enter your new password below to change your password.
changed_successfully: Your password has been changed successfully.
changed_successfully_desc: You can now login with your new password.
